title: The Sign of Love
description: Jasmine Pierce is a small town girl from North Carolina who falls in love with a country boy named Johnny Holloway. He comes into her life during their senior year of high school but what she didnâ€™t know was how he would tear her world apart but at the same time bring her so much joy. Can this young couple make it through what life throws at them or will it be too much?
author: Revonah Hill-Holloway
